channel.title: How do I spawn an Object (NOT A Item)?
channel.description: How do I spawn an object? [u]NOT[/u] an item. Ok, say I wanted to change some stuff around on my server because me server doesn't have an altar to help you train prayer. The object item is chaos altar I think the item id is 0410 or 0411 I edited a pic and the x coords are: 3193 y coords: 3423 I wanted the object to face south and give 8k prayer exp for everytime you pray at it. how do I do it? I would give rep++ but I can soz sorry. Thanks for your peoples help I really appreciate it :)

item.title: How do I spawn an Object (NOT A Item)?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Thanks for code I really appreciate it, I know you people are going to call me a noob but where do I put the code? And btw when I added the AddGlobalObject for altar, I saved it and then compiled it, close my fille and opened it again. I click run server and opened up the moparscape 3.2 w/ aryan I typed in localhost for server ip and type a new username to see if it worked nothing appeared in that spot.I don’t get what happened.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I spawn an Object (NOT A Item)?

item.title: How do I spawn an Object (NOT A Item)?
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

case OBJECTID: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You get pray xp!"); actionTimer = 53; setAnimation(2555); addSkillXP((8000*playerLevel[5]), 5); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

add this if u want to altar give u xp, and if u want it to stand south u will have to change that -1 to - 3

Read full topic

item.title: How do I spawn an Object (NOT A Item)?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

look under your addglobalobj methed.
after it, add a newobjects methed, and use the format provided in the addglobalobj methed.

then add the newobjects methed into case 121.

Read full topic

There’s a void in there(towards top of client.java?) that adds the objects you have randomly there…Just add another one.
